ModMetaData.name: Slimes
ModMetaData.author: Zylle
ModMetaData.description:
Diversify your Slimes!
Adds slimes for all occasions! Each slime is themed around a basic element: steel, wood, jade, fire, silver, gold, chemfuel, and rainbow. Slimes will occasionally drop a bit of their element, and will provide their element on butchery.
Slimes will spawn in the wild, and sometimes be sold by traders. Includes built-in support for biomes from:
Advanced Biomes Alpha Biomes Biome Expansion: Redwood Forest Biomes! Islands Biomes! Oasis More Vanilla Biomes Realistic Planets
Not especially balanced. Please report any issues.
Safe to add mid-game, removing it may cause trouble.
